message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a high-end product that I'm sure you'll find valuable. Would you like to make an offer on this product?
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to consider a lower price. Can you meet me at $12000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $12000. I'm willing to compromise, though. How about we meet in the middle at $15000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit above my budget. Can you consider a price of $10000?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer, so how about $14000?
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back and forth, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer, so how about $11000?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, so how about $13500?
I'm starting to think I'm not going to get a good deal here. Can you meet me at $9000?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to make a final concession, so how about $13000?
